name: Lorera
description:
Lorera is all about using your hook to explore the depths of the mystical colorful world that is Lorera.
Find the secret code to the mysterious portal in the Jungle by exploring the world and decoding cryptic imagery.
Use your hook to swing around, avoid obstacles, kill foes, use momentum to get to hard to reach places and find the lost relics of Lorera to strengthen yourself.



- Lots of hidden levels indicated with balloons at the end.



- Character visual progression whenever you find new abilities.



- Five vastly detailed and different worlds to explore



- 10+ Progressively hard achievements
